attributes.action: Leniency on 2022 GCSE & A - Level Grade boundaries and Exam Conditions.
attributes.additional_details: Some students have only recently received the resources to participate in home learning. Many did not have a proper learning environment and not all content in school will be covered at the pace of students will therefore results will most certainly not reflect the true efforts of pupils. Perhaps the government fails to see everything is still not yet 'normal' so how can we take 'normal' exams. Hence why I am writing to the Government for heavy Leniency on Grades if not cancel them  for some.
attributes.background: Leniency on 2022 GCSE & ALevel Grade boundaries and Exam Conditions if not cancel them for some due to the disruption of Covid19. The Government and Education Minster want the exams to be taken place to return everything to 'normal'. Yet they are no aware of the troubles students have gone through.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Review 2022 exam arrangements for GCSEs and A-levels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566569

Cancel A-level and GCSE exams 2022: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566760

Reduce content for 2022 A-level and GCSE exams: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566803
